level.text: The following uses are prohibited within the HE District as both principal and accessory uses, unless otherwise noted:
Any establishment that has as its principal use the administration of massages;
Any industrial use first permitted in an M District;
At-grade surface parking lots, except as provided in ยง 2803.11;
Drive-through establishment (any establishment where goods are sold/rented or services rendered, directly to occupants of motor vehicles while in the vehicles).
Self-service storage establishment that provides separate storage areas for individual or business uses;
Vehicle repair and servicing, including full-serve and mini-serve gas stations, unattended key card stations, car washes, quick lubrication services, and vehicle emission test sites; and

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking and Order No. 04-05 published at 56 DCR 6181 (August 7, 2009); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 58 DCR 4314, 4316 (May 20, 2011).
